dcterms:creator: S. Mitra
S. K. Mukhopadhyay
M. Mitra
dcterms:description: The MIT-BIH arrhythmia database includes 48 recordings, each of which is sampled at 360 Hz and contains a series of two-leads ECG data. It is used for classifying various arrhythmias such as normal rhythm, left bundle branch block, right bundle branch block, ventricular precontraction, and atrial premature contractions.
dcterms:title: MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Database

dcterms:creator: Bahareh Pourbabaee
Mehrsan Javan Roshtkhari
Khashayar Khorasani
dcterms:description: The 2017 PhysioNet/CinC Challenge Database (2017PCCD) contains 8528 single-lead ECG records collected by wearable devices at a sampling frequency of 300 Hz. It is used to validate the performance of models for detecting normal and atrial fibrillation samples.
dcterms:title: 2017 PhysioNet/CinC Challenge Database (2017PCCD)
